This game is not fun,we do not play it because its fun. Really it gives us depression, ruins our lives and at the end of the day we realise we've played 4 competitive matches and lost most of them and at the end of the day we havent really accomplished anything. However the reason we play this game for so long is that satisfying sound of headshotting some dude with a USP or getting a 1v5 ace and winning the round for your team. The bad thing about this game is the soloq most of the time your gonna team with people who couldn't even beat Stephen Hawking in a 1v1 (pre-death) So overall I recommend this game 10 out of 10 (not recommended for mentally ill or people who struggle with anger).
Toxic Community, Bad Game, Hate It!

Easily one of the best time passing games I've ever played. This game is filled with ups and downs but for some reason I can't stop playing it.

10 years later and the game is still swarming with aim bots/ hackers. 0 feedback from Valve/ Steam. Had personally played against hackers who were not even trying to hide the fact that they are hacking. Weeks passes and these players remain unbanned. 
Trash experience.
